title: Disclosures under Reg. 31(1) and 31(2) of SEBI (SAST) Regulations, 2011. 1d
Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 3 Jun - Sun Pharma discontinues SCD-044 after Phase 2 trials failed efficacy endpoints in psoriasis and dermatitis.
date: 3 Jun - Sun Pharma discontinues SCD-044 after Phase 2 trials failed efficacy endpoints in psoriasis and dermatitis.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 30 May - Annual Secretarial Compliance Report with minor procedural deviation on related party transaction timing.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript 29 May - Q4 FY25: 9% sales growth, $100M Specialty investment, Checkpoint acquisition pending, final dividend Rs.5.50/share.
